import React,{Component} from 'react' import "./Today.css" import SideBody from './sideBody/SideBody' import News from './news/News.js' import axios from 'axios'; class Today extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { latitude:"", longitude:"", searchByLL:"", id:"", city:"" } this.getLocation= this.getLocation.bind(this) this.showPosition= this.showPosition.bind(this) } getLocation() { console.log("hello from location") var x = document.getElementById("demo") if (navigator.geolocation) { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(this.showPosition); } else { x.innerHTML = "Geolocation is not supported by this browser."; } } showPosition(position) { this.setState({ latitude:position.coords.latitude, longitude:position.coords.longitude }) const x = document.getElementById("demo") x.innerHTML = "Latitude: " + position.coords.latitude + "
Longitude: " + position.coords.longitude; } componentDidMount() { this.getLocation(); if(this.getLocation()) { console.log("true")} else{ console.log("not true")}; const tryin= this.state.longitude console.log(this.getLocation()) const dataLol= 'http://api.apixu.com/v1/current.json?key=82fe923258fa4530a5e235322192604&q=' + "Lima" axios.get(dataLol) .then(response => { this.setState({ data: response.data.location}); }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); } render () { {console.log(this.state)} return(
